title: High Traffic Recipe Prediction Model
tagline: Engineered a classification model to predict high traffic recipes for a company websiteâ€™s homepage, achieving 82.6% recall to correctly identify 4 out of 5 high potential recipes. Delivered a data driven solution to boost user engagement and drive subscriptions.

title: Customer Churn Prediction for Banks
tagline: A machine learning web app that predicts at-risk bank customers to support proactive retention strategies.

title: RAG-Conversational Chatbot

tagline: I built an intelligent customer support chatbot that automatically finds answers directly from a company's internal documents.

title: Medical Transcriptions with OpenAI

title: HomelyHub - Real Estate Platform
tagline: During my internship at Webstack Academy, I developed a digital rental marketplace that connects homeowners with tenants, enabling property listings, detailed searches, and booking management.

title: SmartRest AIoT Backend
tagline: Developed an intelligent IoT mattress system that monitors vital signs like heart rate and breathing for elderly and hospital patients, enabling proactive health tracking and sleep quality improvement.

title: Mochi AI Companion App
tagline: Developed a mobile AI companion that provides personalized task guidance and positive emotional support based on the user's profile, goals, and schedule.

title: Ishema Connect

title: Memory Matching Game
tagline: Created an interactive educational game that helps children and teens improve memory and cognitive skills through engaging matching challenges.

title: Expense Tracker App
tagline: Built a simple web application for tracking personal income and expenses with visual spending insights.
